title: MyDoctorOnline AI
opening: Welcome to your AI-powered health assistant
fill_required_fields: Please fill in the required fields to continue.
facebook_auth_coming_soon: Sign in with Facebook is coming soon
terms_accept_text_1: By continuing, you agree that you have read our
warning: All medical information, comments, announcements, and promotional activities on the Doktorumonline.net website are for informational purposes only. They are in no way intended to direct individuals to diagnosis and treatment independently of their doctors.
about_app_info: MyDoctorOnline AI is a mobile health assistant developed with Flutter and using the Firebase infrastructure, which analyzes users' symptoms with an AI-powered chat to provide personalized health recommendations.
forgot_password_description: Enter the email address associated with your account, and we'll send you a password reset link.
forgot_password_send_mail: Enter the email address associated with your account, and we will send you a link to reset your password.
verification_instruction: Click the link sent to your email to verify your account.
tutorial_help_button: Press this button to see the application instructions again.
tutorial_profile_card: You can click on the profile card to edit or activate the profile.
tutorial_add_profile: You can add a new profile from here.
health_profiles_subtitle: Manage your health information and enable your AI doctor to serve you better.
empty_state_message:
No profiles added yet
Start by adding your first profile.
language_region_settings_placeholder: Language and region settings will be here
delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the profile named "{profileName}"?
tutorial_home: Tap this button to start a new consultation. Fill in the required information, and MyDoctorOnline will ask you additional questions.
tutorial_chat: You can see all previous complaints and conversations here. Tap on any of them to open the details.
tutorial_upload: Upload your lab results, blood tests, or prescription as a PDF; MyDoctorOnline will summarize it in seconds and highlight critical findings.
tutorial_profiles: You can create separate profiles for different users and update their health information.
upgrader_prompt: A new version of the app is available!
upgrader_body: Version {{currentAppStoreVersion}} of {{appName}} is available! You are currently using version {{currentInstalledVersion}}.

ai_greeting_no_questions: Hello {}, I am your personal health consultant, MyDoctorOnline. The information you provided seems sufficient. I will evaluate your complaint and provide you with recommendations.
ai_intro_greeting: Hello {}, I am your personal health consultant, MyDoctorOnline. To better interpret your complaint, I will ask some questions. Answering these questions will help me provide better results.
ai_final_evaluation_intro: Based on the information you provided, my conclusions are as follows:
pdf_read_error: PDF content could not be read or is empty.
image_analysis_error: An error occurred during image analysis
pdf_chunk_error: An error occurred while processing this section
ai_system_prompt_medical: You are a medical assistant. Based on the information provided by the user, you identify missing points, ask questions, and then provide a comprehensive and empathetic medical evaluation.
ai_prompt_file_analysis_header: Also, below is the analysis of the file uploaded by the user:
ai_prompt_ask_questions_instruction:
Please carefully review all patient information provided by the user and follow the steps below:

Identify any missing or unclear points in the provided data and ask the user specific questions to clarify. Ask these questions as a numbered list (1, 2, 3...). Each question should be distinct. Do not respond to my prompt, just provide the questions directly.

Use clear, understandable, and empathetic language at every stage.
ai_prompt_final_evaluation_instruction: BLEND all the information above (profile, complaint, question-answers AND FILE ANALYSIS IF ANY) to conduct a comprehensive medical evaluation and make recommendations. Provide suggestions to alleviate the patient's complaint; refer to a doctor if necessary.
ai_prompt_final_evaluation_start_sentenc: You MUST START your response with this sentence and do not relist the user information: "Based on the information you provided, my conclusions are as follows:"
ai_prompt_file_analysis_system_prompt:
Examine the incoming text/image with the meticulousness of a doctor. Please conduct a comprehensive analysis under the following headings, using simple language the user can understand. Start each heading with '##' and write the content below it:

## General Assessment
## Detected Conditions
## Risk Factors
## Recommendations
## Follow-up Suggestions

Use plain language that the user can understand, but also use necessary medical terms with explanations. Provide detailed and comprehensive information for each section.
ai_prompt_analyze_image_request: Please analyze this medical report image.
non_medical_document_error: I'm sorry, I cannot respond unless you upload a medical document
validation_invalid_height: Please enter a valid height (1-300 cm)
validation_inavlid_weight: Please enter a valid weight (1-500 kg)
validation_complaint_short: Please describe your complaint in more detail (at least 10 characters)
validation_enter_duration: Please state the duration of the complaint
validation_invalid_drug: Please Enter Medication Information in More Detail (At least 3 characters)
validation_invalid_cronical: Please enter chronic illness information in more detail
